description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Hong Kong, Hong Kong. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Hong Kong Five-Star Victoria Harbour Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Dining Credit
hotels.description: Experience the romance of disappearing into a glittering cityscape from your sky-high stay at this five-star lifestyle hotel. In the heart of Taikoo Shing, the eastern business district, EAST Hong Kong fosters complete cosmopolitan immersion with the charm of local neighbourhood surroundings. Explore the city's iconic waterfront by bike, or shop up a drop at the CityPlaza Shopping Center, connected to the design-driven hotel. Should further adventures be calling, the Tai Koo MTR is just steps away, connecting you to the rest of the vibrant city. Come sunset, venture up to the Sugar rooftop bar for signature cocktails and tasty tapas with views over the harbour, or take a culinary adventure at FEAST (Food by EAST), the bustling eatery featuring international cuisine with fresh flavours. Best of all, you can rest your head knowing that your stay isn't harming the planet: the majority of products being recyclable or reusable and plant-based fare commonplace on restaurant menus, while in-room water filters leave little need for single-use plastics.

hotels.vendor_name: WM Hotel Hong Kong, Vignette Collection
hotels.title: Serene Hong Kong Seaside Escape with Rooftop Infinity Pool, Three Restaurants & International Minimart
hotels.description: Experience a hidden gem removed from the stunning vibrance of Hong Kong at contemporary-cool WM Hotel Hong Kong, Vignette Collection, an IHG Hotel. Nestled among rolling hills on the tranquil Sai Kung seaside, here you can unwind with a dip in the rooftop infinity pool, maintain your fitness routine at the state-of-the-art gym and delight in a delectable dinner at one of three onsite restaurants. When it's time to explore, you're still within easy reach of the bustling city.

hotels.title: Elegant Hong Kong Urban Escape near Exhibition Centre with Tranquil Pool & Two Restaurants
hotels.description: Experience the dazzle of Hong Kong with a stay at this Novotel sanctuary, perfectly positioned in the bustling Wan Chai district and within easy reach of the Convention and Exhibition Centre. Savour international flavours and seafood delicacies at Le Cafe, feast on Italian fare at Pepino and indulge at AK's Bar + Lounge while soaking up city views from floor-to-ceiling windows. Spend your days lounging by the outdoor pool and take advantage of the hotel's prime location to explore the city's premier shopping, dining and entertainment venues at the iconic Causeway Bay. With the famous Star Ferry and tram - locally known as ding-ding - on your doorstep, you can explore the island with complete ease.

hotels.title: Sleek Hong Kong Retreat in Tsim Sha Tsui District with Onsite Cocktail Bar & Italian Steakhouse
hotels.description: Discover Hong Kong's infectious energy with this five-star contemporary stay as your base. Gaze out at spectacular views of the city as it wakes up below you, then explore the neon-lit Nathan Road or luxury shopping of Canton Road, easily accessible from the nearby metro station. Ascend to the 38th floor of this sleek hotel and you’ll find Avoca, offering handcrafted cocktails and curated bites. Or, feast on Tuscan steakhouse cuisine at Carna by Dario Cecchini.

hotels.title: Contemporary Hong Kong Escape Just Five Minutes from Airport with Outdoor Pool & Complimentary Shuttle
hotels.description: Experience the best of Hong Kong with a stay in the heart of Tung Chung. Perfectly located on Lantau Island - just five minutes from Hong Kong International Airport (and with a complimentary shuttle) - this stylish haven is your gateway to adventure, with Hong Kong Disneyland within easy reach and the Ngong Ping 360 Cable Car both offering seamless access to the Big Buddha and Po Lin Monastery. Indulge in culinary delights at Olea, Essence or Moccato and jump into a beautiful outdoor pool. Direct access to Tung Chung MTR puts the city’s vibrant heart within easy reach, while the adjacent Citygate Outlets offer irresistible shopping treasures.

hotels.title: Five-Star Designer Hong Kong Sanctuary with Wellness Spa & Rooftop Lawn
hotels.description: In the heart of Hong Kong, where the streets are buzzing with energy, there is The Upper House - a sanctuary of peace that feels worlds away. Embracing modern minimalist design, this inner-city haven exudes a sense of Zen. From the serene blonde-wood yoga room to the wellness suites that afford captivating vistas of the skyline, every element is thoughtfully curated. At the crown of the hotel, the Salisterra restaurant emanates a warm Mediterranean ambience, meanwhile, The Lawn invites you to indulge in delightful moments on the rooftop, a glass of wine in hand. The architectural brilliance of Andre Fu, the renowned designer, reaches its zenith in the guest suites and studios, each one of them offering unparalleled views of the iconic cityscape, reminding you that the electric pull of Hong Kong is never far away.

hotels.title: Five-Star Hong Kong City Break with Nine Restaurants & Multi-Award-Winning Spa
hotels.description: A sophisticated stay awaits at the legendary Mandarin Oriental, Hong Kong, an icon of the city's luxury hotel landscape since the 1960s. Magnificent views, unrivalled service and cutting-edge facilities put this urban sanctuary on the map, which sits in the heart of the bustling metropolis. Both the hotel and its dreamy, world-class spa were awarded prestigious five-star status by Forbes Travel Guide in 2022. The property's incredible nine bars and restaurants, two of which possess Michelin stars, are renowned for their quality and draw in locals and visitors alike. Head to Man Wah for traditional Cantonese, The Aubrey for Japanese Izakaya and Captain's Bar for classic cocktails - and that's just the beginning.

hotels.vendor_name: Hyatt Regency Hong Kong, Sha Tin
hotels.title: Hong Kong Hyatt Opulence with Onsite Dining, Spa & Kids Club
hotels.description: Hyatt Regency Hong Kong, Sha Tin offers a tranquil yet convenient retreat combining resort-style luxury with urban accessibility. Situated adjacent to University MTR Station, the hotel provides seamless connections to Hong Kong's bustling city centre. Boasting elegantly appointed rooms and suites, many offering stunning views of Tolo Harbour and the surrounding mountains, it is the perfect Hong Kong escape. Enjoy dining at Sha Tin 18, serving authentic northern Chinese cuisine with creative desserts and signature dishes such as peking duck. When it is time to relax, look no further than Melo Spa for soothing treatments, or unwind at the outdoor swimming pool with a beautiful backdrop and calming views of Kau To Shan mountain.

hotels.title: Stylish Hong Kong Escape in the Heart of Wan Chai with Rooftop Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Discover the many wonders of Wan Chai with a stay at Hotel Indigo Hong Kong Island, an IHG Hotel, located among the iconic neighbourhood’s famed collection of storied temples, soaring skyscrapers and rainbow mansions. Head to Indicolite for casual tea, street noodles and majestic views of the city’s historic Old Post Office, Skybar for cockails in the clouds, or the hotel’s glass-bottomed rooftop infinity pool for fun-filled days high in the Wan Chai sky.

hotels.vendor_name: Kimpton Tsim Sha Tsui Hong Kong
hotels.title: Hong Kong Victoria Harbour Elegance with Onsite Dining, Outdoor Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Perched above Hong Kong's electric Tsim Sha Tsui district, Kimpton transforms urban sophistication into pure artistry. Four bars and restaurants dance between tradition and innovation, while a rejuvenating spa and breathtaking rooftop pool provide an escape from the city noise. Sip extraordinary cocktails at Swim Club, where exotic flavours meet innovative mixology on the spectacular 50th-floor poolside terrace. For the ultimate indulgence, High Dive elevates nightlife with rare auction spirits served in Baccarat crystal - each sip a celebration. From harbour views to world-class amenities, every moment is an unforgettable experience in Hong Kong's most vibrant neighbourhood.
